//Balls denotes balls left and runs denotes runs left.
#include<cstdio>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define MAXI 10000007
int kase,n,ans,dp[10009][10],t;
int calc(int runs,int balls)
{
 if(runs<=0 || balls==0)return 1;
 if(dp[runs][balls]!=-1)return dp[runs][balls];
 int ways=1+calc(runs,balls-1);//If a wicket falls,the game could end or go on
 ways+=calc(runs,balls-1)+calc(runs-1,balls-1)+calc(runs-2,balls-1)+calc(runs-3,balls-1)+calc(runs-4,balls-1)+calc(runs-6,balls-1)+2*calc(runs-1,balls)+2*calc(runs-2,balls)+calc(runs-3,balls)+2*calc(runs-5,balls)+calc(runs-7,balls);
 //All possible outcomes
 return dp[runs][balls]=ways%MAXI;
}
int main()
{ 
 memset(dp,-1,sizeof(dp));
 scanf("%d",&t);
 for(kase=1;kase<=t;kase++)
 {
  scanf("%d",&n);
  ans=calc(n,6);
  printf("Case %d: %d\n",kase,ans);
 }
// getch();
}
